name: Dedalium
description:
Dedalium is the completely free RPG online game with the characteristic that it can be played through a browser extension on any website that you are visiting.

You create a character (Network Guardian) which you can customize, choose strategy and improve it's gear. You can find Dedalium crystals, enemies and other players to fight anywhere and also you can fight through the website on the adventure mode and versus other players.
